summary: Finnish Kerttu Nuorteva is spying for the Russians in Helsinki during World War II. She is arrested and interrogated in the hope that she will uncover the Soviet Union espionage tactics.
cast: Minna Haapkylä|Marcus Groth|Hannu-Pekka Björkman|Lauri Nurkse|Kristiina Elstelä|Rea Mauranen|Pertti Sveholm|Marja Packalén|Uula Laakso|Markku Maalismaa|Ursula Salo|Mikko Reitala|Juha Erola|Eeva-Liisa Haimelin|Petri Ihonen|Nina Lindfors|Melli Maikkula|Matti Näränen|Jörn Donner
title: Kuulustelu
